GeDBIT.dist

接口 Metric

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    CountedMetric, EditDistance, ImageMetric, LMetric, MSMetric, MSMSMetric, SequenceFragmentMetric, WHDGlobalFragmentMetric, WHDGlobalSequenceFragmentMetric

    public interface Metric
extends java.io.Serializable
    Metric is a distance oracle. It specifies a binary function to compute distance between two data points in metric space. The distance should have the metric properties, i.e. non-negativity, symmetry and triangle inequality.
    版本:
    2005.10.31
    作者:
    Jack, Rui Mao, Willard

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double getDistance(IndexObject one, IndexObject two)
      Computes the distance between two objects.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDistance

        double getDistance(IndexObject one,
                 IndexObject two)
        Computes the distance between two objects.
        参数:
        one - the first IndexObject to compute distance on
        two - the second IndexObject to compute distance on
        返回:
        the distance between the two objects
